mapper.insert: insert tb_exhibit ( exhib_title, exhib_kind, exhib_theme, exhib_simple_exp, exhib_detail_exp, exhib_start_date, exhib_end_date, exhib_location, exhib_uri, usr_seq, exhib_cret_date, exhib_mod_date, file_dir_name, file_name, goods_allow ) values ( #{exhibTitle}, #{exhibKind}, #{exhibTheme}, #{exhibSimpleExp}, #{exhibDetailExp}, #{exhibStartDate}, #{exhibEndDate}, #{exhibLocation}, #{exhibUri}, #{usrSeq}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{fileDirName},#{fileName}, #{goodsAllow} )
insert tb_file_exhibit ( exhib_seq, file_dir_name, file_uuid, file_name, file_exhib_cret_date ) values ( #{exhibSeq}, #{fileDirName}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE() )
